column4: ouch. installing gnome-panel conflicts flashplugin, vlc, qt, etc, etc...
gnome-panel is an afterthought, it is not well integrated into the system and it does not offer the full Gnome2 experience you had in 11.04
so... how do I edit the freedesktop.org standard menus in 11.10?
I don't know, you'll have to ask someone else
